biog.entry.name: BYRNE, the Hon. Anthony Michael
biog.entry.description: Biography for BYRNE, the Hon. Anthony Michael
biog.entry.electorate.name: Member for Holt (Vic)
biog.entry.title: Biography for BYRNE, the Hon. Anthony Michael
biog.entry.electorate.state.name: Member for Holt (Vic)
biog.entry.party.name: Australian Labor Party

parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Holt, Victoria at by-election 6.11.1999 vice the Hon. GJ Evans (resigned). Re-elected 2001, 2004, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Parliamentary Secretary to the Prime Minister from 3.12.07 to 14.9.10.
Parliamentary Secretary for Trade from 25.2.09 to 14.9.10.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: House of Representatives Standing: Environment and Heritage from 1.6.00 to 8.10.01; Industry and Resources from 20.3.02 to 21.10.02; Members Interests from 2.12.04 to 17.10.07; Science and Innovation from 2.12.04 to 10.5.05; Petitions from 25.10.10.

Joint Statutory: Corporations and Financial Services from 20.3.02 to 31.8.04; Australian Crime Commission from 2.12.04 to 12.9.05; ASIO, ASIS and DSD from 7.3.05 to 2.12.05; Intelligence and Security from 2.12.05 to 17.10.07 and from 18.11.10 (Chair from 18.11.10 to 5.8.13 and Deputy Chair from 12.12.13).
Joint Standing: Treaties from 16.2.00 to 11.2.02; Foreign Affairs, Defence and Trade from 24.9.02 to 31.8.04, from 25.10.10 to 14.3.12 and from 19.9.12 to 5.8.13.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Shadow Parliamentary Secretary for Foreign Affairs from 10.12.06 to 3.12.07.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Member, ALP Public Office Selection Committee.
Member, ALP Caucus Committee on Security and Defence.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Chief Executive Officer, Anxiety Disorders Foundation of Australia 1994-96.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: south-eastern Melbourne; it includes the suburbs of Clyde, Clyde North, Cranbourne, Cranbourne East, Cranbourne North, Cranbourne West, Doveton, Endeavour Hills, Eumemmerring, Hallam, Hampton Park, Lynbrook, Lyndhurst, Lysterfield South, Narre Warren, Narre Warren North and Narre Warren South.
Industries: retail, service and light industries.
State electorates: Holt includes parts of the Victorian Legislative Assembly electorates of Cranbourne, Dandenong, Narre Warren North, Narre Warren South and Rowville.
